Short Explanation:
32 possible IVs (0-31) for both HP and Def/SpDef
For Def/SpDef, there are also natures in play
4/25 natures are negative, 17/25 are neutral and 4/25 are positive
so for Def as well as SpDef, there are 32*25=800 possible nature/IV combinations

___________________________________________________________________

Route 3 (as Level 15 Squirtle with 26 SpAtk)

Level 6 Spearow

20 HP: 4/32
21 HP: 16/32
22 HP: 12/32

7 SpDef: 0-4- 20/800
8 SpDef: 5-21- 0-4| 0-4+ 68/800- 85/800| 20/800+ 173/800
9 SpDef: 22-31- 5-21| 5-21+ 40/800- 289/800| 68/800+ 397/800
10 SpDef: 22-31| 170/800
11 SpDef: 22-31+ 40/800

chances to die to Bubble*:
7/20: 20/800 * 4/32 * 16/16 =		1280
7/21: 20/800 * 16/32 * 16/16 = 		5120
7/22: 20/800 * 12/32 * 16/16 =		3840
8/20: 173/800 * 4/32 * 16/16 =		11072
8/21: 173/800 * 16/32 * 16/16 = 	44288
8/22: 173/800 * 12/32 * 13/16 =		26988
9/20: 397/800 * 4/32 * 10/16 =		15880
9/21: 397/800 * 16/32 * 5/16 = 		31760
9/22: 397/800 * 12/32 * 1/16 =		4764
10/20: 170/800 * 4/32 * 5/16 =		3400
10/21: 170/800 * 16/32 * 1/16 = 	2720
								  = 151112 / 409600
								  = 36,89%

20 HP: 2/32

12 SpDef: 30-31| 10-29+ 34/800| 80/800+ 114/800

chances to die to Water Gun*:
9/18: 120/800 * 10/32 * 15/16 = 	18000
9/19: 120/800 * 20/32 * 10/16 = 	24000
9/20: 120/800 * 2/32 * 5/16 = 		1200
10/18: 178/800 * 10/32 * 6/16 = 	10680
10/19: 178/800 * 20/32 * 1/16 = 	3560
11/18: 380/800 * 10/32 * 1/16 = 	3800
								  = 61240/409600
								  = 14,95%

chances to die to Tackle: very low
You would need
31IV in Atk as Squirtle
a 0-29 Def IV -Def Nature (120/800)
and 0-9 HP IV			  (10/32)
and a maxroll to kill     (1/16)
						  = 1200/409600
						  = 0,29%

chances to die to Tackle:

							  = 0,096%

9/20: 28/800 * 14/32 * 5/16 = 	1960
9/21: 28/800 * 16/32 * 1/16 = 	448

it is not worth using Surf if you are out of Torrent
WP can never kill and almost certainly makes an Ultra Ball catch guaranteed
Surf has a slightly higher kill chance than WP*

always a guaranteed catch with an Ultra Ball after WP*
